title: For sale: Individual (really nice) Helmar stamps
author: Archive

posts.post_title: For sale: Individual (really nice) Helmar stamps
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rob D.
Most of the Helmar stamps I typically see are pretty rough. Many of the ones listed here are exceptionally nice, and some could be candidates for grading (if you're so inclined, of course). This is a great opportunity to add a nice-condition, tough type card to your team collection or to fill in some holes on your Helmar set.

All of the images below were scanned with the stamp inside a sleeve, which was inside the top loader. I mention this because the colors on these are very vibrant, and the scans might not reflect this. If you'd like larger, higher-resolution scans of any stamp(s), just drop me an e-mail.

E-mails take priority over posts. I'll be in and out all day but will answer all e-mails and reserve stamps in the order your e-mails are received. Payment by check or money order only. To make up for the no-PayPal delay, if we've done business before or I recognize you from the board, I'll ship your stamps the day after a sale in confirmed.

Thanks, Rob
wolfie51sb@aol.com

(All prices are delivered)
